entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm][aot] JsonSerializer.Serialize produced incorrect result #96043
  • [mono][tests] System.Numerics.Vectors.Tests attempting to JIT compile method #96041
    9.0.0
  • Add missing Async methods to System.Threading.Channels on .NET Standard 2.0 #96039
  • Assertion failed '(fgEntryBB->bbRefs == 1) && (fgEntryBB->bbPreds == nullptr)' #96038
  • AOT compilation to publish program the code from the dependency libraries cannot be included in the DLL #96036
  • XUnitLogChecker: `runtime-libraries-coreclr outerloop` tests are unable to find the tool DLL #96035
  • ValidateOnStart() does not work in Azure Function #96034
  • CoreCLR build does not honor custom artifacts location #96027
  • DateTime format uses a non standard space character when running in a Docker Linux container #96022
  • [iOS] Implement validations to prevent the disabling of HybridGlobalization #96020
  • [browser] Add test case for `maxParallelDownloads` #96016
    9.0.0
  • Exception when adding console logging #96010
  • Problem with stackalloc code analyzer inside loop #96008
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 7 Regressions on 12/12/2023 12:38:01 AM #96030
  • [JIT] Remove BBF_NONE_QUIRK #95998
  • ilc.exe is not passed arguments #95997

Closed

  • Infrastructure - Status/Health #702
    Future
  • [browser] `HybridGlobalization` crashes on V8 and browser #96028
  • [wasm] Lot of HybridGlobalization test failures with NodeJS #95983
  • Crash when allocating 4+ MB with high LOH threshold #95219
  • HttpClientBuilderExtensions.SetHandlerLifetime() and HttpClient.Timeout #96029
    9.0.0
  • Add TestReadyToRun Leg to CI #85417
    9.0.0
  • Strange behavior of Dictionary initializer #96011
  • UseManagedNtlm in NET8 cannot authenticate NTLM on IIS with Extended Protection Accept & Required #95725
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'optLoopTable != nullptr' during 'Hoist loop code' with jit dumps enabled #95987
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Operator overload of `/` for combining DirectoryInfo and FileInfo instead of Path.Combine #95982
    Future
  • [release/7.0] CI failure: Build Linux x64 release SourceBuild, unable to optimize assemblies for performance, runtime package not found #80284
  • Q: How to use DirectPInvoke/NativeLibrary when linking a C++ executable? #96021
  • System.Text.Json: Serialize to stream ignores property #96001
  • Move R2RDump over to the new System.CommandLine #12766
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix JSON format exception attribution #96040
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [browser] Disable crashing tests on HybridGlobalization #96031
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, disabled-test
  • Implement KMAC #96025
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [WIP][mono] Adding osx-arm64 Mono Interpreter runtime tests job to extra-platforms #96023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser] Use whole assembly name when looking for already loaded assemblies #96018
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [IGNORE] Just a test. #96013
    NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • Gate emit unit tests on JitDumpEmitUnitTests instead of define #96005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization support IgnoreKanaType #96002
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • JIT: Remove no-diff BBF_NONE_QUIRK checks #95999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE2: Add IF_SVE_DQ_0A, IF_SVE_DR_1A, IF_SVE_DS_2A #95996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IH_3A` to `SVE_JO_3A` #95994
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [NativeAOT] Refactored GCToEEInterface and RedhawkGCInterface implementations into separate files. #95991
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize flips between 1 and 0 #95990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix DefaultPrimaryRuntimeFlavor on mobile #96026
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] ComputeWasmPublishAssets: update to track the rename of `emcc-props.json` to `wasm-props.json` #96042
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use a sorted module order for metadata generation #96007
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make sorting of modules more stable in the compiler #96006
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Adjust HybridGlobalization test to updated NodeJS on Windows #96003
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Make sure LOHThreshold less than region_size #95485
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Fix calculation of channel bindings hash in managed NTLM implementation #95898
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Upgrade Perf Owl queues to the new queues. #95995
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Remove a use of the old loop table in hoisting #96009
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix disable of loop table #95988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add reporting of JIT assertions for SuperPMI replay #95978
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test with EventPipe CFG library in Windows #95966
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Remove custom attribute support for System.DateTime #95967
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Mark Encode on ASN.1 structs as readonly #95976
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm/wasi] Fix size regression #95992
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add EventBuilder implementation #95936
    area-System.Reflection.Emit

Updated

  • Allow specifying indent size and whitespace character when writing JSON #95985
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Extract `src/mono/browser` from `src/mono/wasm` #95940
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [browser] introduce JSProxyContext #95959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Provide More Detailed Information in System.TypeLoadException for Incorrect MethodImplAttribute Marking #95833
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Updating Sum() implementation for Vector128 and Vector256 + adding lowering for Vector512 #95568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rework the special instantiation type logic to be more effective #95490
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Use multi-reg load/store for EncodeToUtf8 #95513
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Optimize circular buffers #95989
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Re-add Stack Overflow handling in NativeAOT with larger alternate stack #95808
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix ILLink/ILC hang when tracking too many hoisted local values #95302
    Servicing-approved, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Build fixes for Bionic on x64 #95382
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Clean up the thread local memory regardless of managed thread's presence #95722
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] [NativeAOT/Apple] Map the thunks using vm_allocate/vm_remap #95964
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [aot][browser] Stop throwing in CultureInfo getter #95910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Disable code formatting in code we want to keep as is #95986
    area-Meta
  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CX_4A group #95918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow preinitializing `AppContext.TryGetSwitch` #95948
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • use enclosing type cls handle for VN of static gc/non-gc helper #95840
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clarify OS and Arch ownership #95972
    area-Extensions-Configuration

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Support dotnet.js #2434

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Integrate dotnet.js into ILCompiler.LLVM #2453
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] JS Interop #2440

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug]: `-getProperty` shows workloads update message #37520
  • [NETE2ESDK] [Regression] With .NET 9 SDK installed, it should return that the tool was successfully installed when the tool was installed globally. #37501
    8.0.2xx

Closed

  • Dotnet format fails with EnforceCodeStyleInBuild enabled in 7.0.200 #30742
  • AnalysisLevel `preview` is broken #35932
  • dotnet gloabl tool can not be start after uprade to dotnet sdk 8.0 on Ubuntu(WSL) #37017
  • [NETE2ESDK] With .NET 9 SDK installed, it should not be an unhandled exception when intalling tools that don't exist. #37123

PullRequests

Created

  • Update minimum VS version to 17.8 in 8.0.2xx #37517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix sln add for duplicate projects under different paths with same root #37516
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove pinning from xdt #37518
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37498
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 22.1.4 to 22.5.0 in /eng/dependabot #37031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Updated

  • Provide new default for runtime identifier Fixes #35575 #36848
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Dedup version for workload version subcommand Fixes #35920 #36085
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Permit setting whether to use workload sets or loose manifests Fixes #34561 #37346
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Enable TerminalLogger by default for .NET 9 SDKs #37492
    untriaged, breaking-change, Area-CLI, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.1xx
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add `--framework` option to restore command #37459
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Store the dest collection as span to a temp for CopyTo optimization #71270
  • Unused class generated when using Expression<Func<>> #71263

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34414.81 #71267
  • Unset EffectiveAnalysisLevelStyle causes error in AddGlobalAnalyzerConfigForPackage target #71260
  • `IDE0300` is reported twice #71234
  • [API Proposal]: Add `GetDeclaredSymbol` overload for `LocalFunctionStatementSyntax` #71028
  • NullReferenceException at Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.VisualBasicDataFlowAnalysis.get_ReadInside() #71115
    17.9
  • Version 4.9.x packages missing on Nuget Gallery #71226

PullRequests

Created

  • Params Collections: Implement "Better function member" section of the proposal #71271
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Revert "Merge pull request #71258 from mavasani/RemoveFadingDiagnostics" #71269
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Standardize use of prepareMachine for ci cleanup #71265
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Remove extra backslash from IBC script #71264
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Use runtime helper `CreateSpan` for `stackalloc` of non-byte arrays #71261
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Extract compilation-tracker/SG-production code out of SolutionState to a new owner. #71257
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71256
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Revert "Restore using dotnet CLI to ensure NuGet environment variables are used" #71266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update MSBuild ref dependency #71069
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update NuGet-packages.md for 17.8 #70682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add check for EffectiveAnalysisLevelStyle in code style targets #71262
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Do not report separate diagnostics just for fading #71258
    Area-IDE, IDE-CodeStyle, untriaged, Next
  • Add GetDeclaredSymbol overload for LocalFunctionStatementSyntax #71169
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix null ref exception in Symbol.CanBeReferencedByName for VB #71253
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Pass in helixApiAccessToken when available #71235
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update status/details on implicit indexers in object initializers #71164
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next

Updated

  • Fix the binlog version mismatch in 17.8 #71255
  • Do not compile all types during ENC #71254
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Collection expression spread optimization #71195
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use NetCurrent instead of net8.0 #71229
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Split integration test build from test run #71166
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not resolve diagnostics early during attribute binding #71140
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement json serialization/deserialization for LSP json messages. Part 2/N #68990
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement json serialization/deserialization for LSP json messages. Part 1/N. #71141
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and… #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Run Spanish tests on CoreClr #67748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow collection expressions with `CreateCompilation` #71134
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Component named "Text" can't be used directly inside a code block #52829
  • In Blazor, give the user the ability to use CSS Isolation but without using .razor file #52826
  • Telegram miniapp (TMA) developmet via blazor #52825
  • [Blazor] Optimizing file delivery #52824
    Planning: WebUI
  • [QuickGrid] When pagination is provided the extra rows being added to the body do not have `td`s being added to them #52822
  • JwtBearer doesn't populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52820
  • [Blazor] Better JS integration / modernization #52819
    Planning: WebUI
  • Refresh Token Rotation Identity Endpoints .NET 8 #52815
  • Speed up ILEmitTrie jump table using Binary Search Tree #52812

Closed

  • Make TUser nullable on IPasswordValidator.ValidateAsync #52606
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: single_query #52813
  • How to use Razor library with "Blazor Web App project template" server+client .NET 8.0? #52752
  • Blazor's InputSelect does not validate with Required attribute #52779
  • [Blazor][Wasm] Consider making AuthorizationMessageHandler thread safe #20726
    Planning: WebUI
  • Ready repository with an example WebAssemblyPrerendered and Razor Pages #42408
    Planning: WebUI
  • Add link to identity documentation in the Blazor WASM template #32883
    Planning: WebUI
  • Add ability to Set the Log Level on an ErrorBoundary #48048
    Planning: WebUI
  • [.NET 6 Blazor server] can't catch properly an ObjectDisposedException when stream from c# to Js #39017
    Planning: WebUI
  • wwwroot DirectoryNotFound #51219
    Planning: WebUI
  • Correct implementation of custom AuthenticationStateProvider in server-side Blazor #38624
    Planning: WebUI
  • Performance regression on wasm builds #48837
    Planning: WebUI
  • Examine the performance of AdditionalAssemblies in Router #46820
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor Wasm App publish is failing with '--self-contained false --runtime linux-arm' on missing DotNetJsVersion #39284
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Blazor] Cannot bind custom checkbox element's `checked` value #24916
    Planning: WebUI
  • Find a way to prevent setting the Client project as `Startup` in the Blazor WASM hosted solution #21699
    Planning: WebUI
  • Something wrong with AuthorizationMessageHandler in .net 6 #38486
    Planning: WebUI
  • Invalid Sample for Custom AuthenticationStateProvider #30971
    Planning: WebUI
  • Cannot integrate into other SPA because of <base /> mismatch #40114
    Planning: WebUI
  • The blazer auto rendering mode did not work as expected. #52719
  • [Blazor Web Discussion] Clarify Data Access for auto mode #52818
  • Blazor: Scoped Services are disposed when circuit is closed when using some (but not all) components in a WebAsembly #52772
  • Perf regression: json #52803
  • Meta Tags added via HeadContent not detected when sharing to social media #43128
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix shadow copy up to date check on startup #52831
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Add ForgotPasswordRequest to STJ source generation context #52830
    Servicing-consider, area-identity, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52823
    area-blazor
  • Populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52821
    area-auth, community-contribution, area-security
  • [release/8.0] Fix app_offline detection for some OSes #52810
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Disable crossgen for VMR cross builds #52828
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix app_offline detection for some OSes #52780
    feature-iis, area-networking, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix metrics duration and http.route tag with exception handling #52790
    area-hosting, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Test] Fix failing Android Compatibility Tests caused by #19349 #19432
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [net9.0] Fix Trimming issues on Windows #19430
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [net9.0] Re-enable Tizen Support on net9 Branch #19429
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [net9.0] Refining Microsoft.Maui.Graphics in .NET 9.0 Branch #19428
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Windows] Unable to change color of SearchBar bottom line and selected flyout menu #19426
  • When I try to set text from code the textColor do not applied for Entry on iOS #19424
    Backlog
  • [iOS] ZIndex + ScrollView issue #19423
  • Not able select Listview items some times in MAUI for Windows #19422
  • Button on .NET8 not considering CornerRadius="0" #19421
    Backlog
  • WebView Flickers on Android when you visit the page more than once #19420
  • macOS webview cannot open filedialog to upload file #19418
  • Restore is failing. Error - AndroidManifest.xml file doesn't exist in default MAUI project #19416
  • StrictMode violation in `ShellSectionRenderer.OnCreateView()` leading to 8-second blocking during startup #19415
  • [Android] StrictMode violation caused by IllegalAccessException in ShellSectionRenderer.OnCreateView() during startup #19414

Closed

  • There is a lot of space between each data when nested collection view is implemented in .NET MAUI in iOS #18476
  • setting AreBrowserAcceleratorKeysEnabled does not have effect #19419
  • Shapes rendered incorrectly unless both width and height are specified #19427
  • dotnet test fails when test project targets net6.0-windows10.0.19041 #11575
    Backlog
  • xml files under Android\Resources\xml are *not* packaged in the resulting apk under res\xml #19417
  • Pinch to Gesture is not working for Content View, when adding it to a scroll view #5614
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.6.23329.7] Can't set MAUI iOS Navigation Icon after updating to 17.8.0 Preview 7.0 #19276
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D9 #18754
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [regression/8.0.3] [IOS] .NET 8.0 - Objective-C exception thrown. Name: CALayerInvalidGeometry #19120
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.3] first item in CollectionView larger than rest #19195
  • Reduce the width of the program window and click on the Tab (ShellContent) header in FlyoutItem for an error. #19266
  • If FlyoutHeaderBehavior="CollapseOnScroll", the display position of the HEADER moves abnormally up. #19268
  • [regression/7.0.101] Entry placeholder value is clear after clear button click in MAUI UWP #19226
  • When making minor changes to a xaml file, after saving and running on Windows Machine a unhandled exception happens. When changing back (ctrl-z) it doesn't fix it. #19193
  • Issue with iOS Screen Overlay and Non-Clickable Items in .NET MAUI #19216
  • IMauiContext not found when calling IImageSourceHandler.LoadImageAsync() #7646
  • AndroidManifest no longer gets version number from project file #19164
  • Issue with Navigation Back Button Disappearing on Windows Platform in .NET MAUI App #19275

PullRequests

Created

  • Expose generic delegates for BindableProperty via Create method #19431
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨

Merged

  • Update version for CI/Nightlies #19425
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D9 #18762
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19413
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Translucent and Transparent NavigationBar on iOS #19204
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, .NET 8 SR2
  • [net9.0] Update net9.0 with new versions #19236
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [macOS] Fix `GesturePlatformManager.CalculatePosition` when asked for a relative position #19371
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • [iOS] Fix Flyout layout #19125
    area/shell 🐢
  • Clean up / Linq removal #19260
    area/animation 🎬, community ✨
  • Do not use underscores in the ApplicationId #19377
    area/templates 📄
  • Bump to new stable versions of iOS and Android workloads #19393
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add better exception for missing Maps on Windows #19046
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, stale, area/Maps🗺
  • Add Android 14.0 or API 34 to the test matrix #18721
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, stale
  • Add benchmarking class for PropertyMapper extensions #18660
    stale
  • Added TimePicker TimeSelected Event #18565
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker, stale
  • [Android] Fix Enter key triggering ReturnCommand on Entry #18560
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, stale
  • [ios] update `MemoryAnalyzers` package, add to Controls #18318
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, stale, memory-leak 💦
  • Invalidate Shapes BackgroundColor #18183
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, stale
  • Add remapping extensions for core #17918
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, stale
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, stale
  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, stale, Under Consideration
  • Android Ecosystem updates - AndroidX #17318
    stale, area/platform
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, stale, memory-leak 💦
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, stale, Under Consideration
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, Under Consideration
  • [X] Warn on non compiled bindings #19360
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.4 to 4.3.3 #19394
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [X] Change the default value for xaml-comp #19390
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Trimming] Fix several trimming warnings #19402
    area/publishing 🏁
  • XamlC WarnAsErrors. #19337
    area/Xaml </>
  • Add GCs to better validate GC related issue paths #19409
  • Clean up async assertions #19385

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EfCore.SqlServer: string.IndexOf throws NullReferenceException when applied on Int.ToString() #32618
  • String comparison fails when using const and compiled Models. #32617
  • Test that EF command line options have not been co-opted by the SDK again #32616
  • Using SqliteConnection from an ASP.NET MVC (.NET Framework) application results in a few different exceptions #32614

Closed

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteConnectionPool.GetConnection() fails with "Inconceivable!" on local test run #26016
    9.0.0
  • Sqlite: Deleting a database previously referenced by a different connection string throws #25797
    9.0.0
  • Occasional TextTemplatingModelGeneratorTest failure #30682
  • Creating a new SqliteConnection from a project targeting net48 fails with TypeInitializationException #32610
  • Occasional failure of ExecuteReader_retries_when_busy #29377
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Check error code when binding parameters #32613
  • [release/8.0] Check value converter configuration source when setting element type. #32612
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • Update screenshot used in DailyBuilds.md #32604
    community-contribution
  • Fix concurrency issues with SQLite pooling #32615
  • Scaffolding Change -d option to -m, since -d no longer works #32606
  • Check value converter configuration source when setting element type #32600

Updated

  • Update developer docs for building packages and using developer build config #32597
  • Call virtual SqliteCommand.Parameters instead of using the backing field #32607
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Cleanup when error occurs on dispose. #32605

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • Shorten source-build inner clone path #17980
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #17978
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #17977
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #17976

Merged

  • Remove unused Microsoft.Build.CentralPackageVersions #17981
  • Pass CrossBuild to inner builds #17972
  • Do not reuse existing installation of .NET CLI in SB prep script #17892
  • Fixes SDK diff after release of Aspire #17893
  • Add back security-partners-dotnet pipeline #17956
  • Add back security-partners-dotnet pipeline #17955
  • Add templating patch to target net9.0 #17952
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #17965

Updated

  • Add CoreCLR crossbuild job #17967
  • [VMR] Initial attempt at a Mac VMR build #17934
  • [NO MERGE] Installer (Merge to SDK) - Changeset #17959
    DO NOT MERGE
